name: Moskito
description:
READ ME!!!!!

This is an early beta, so a lot of the features aren't here yet.

A survival rougelike where you craft tools, build shelter, or explore in caverns and dungeons that hold many treasures. Defeat the final boss to win, or continue to survive as long as you can.

WASD to move

E to open inventory

L-CLICK to destroy things

Extract the zip to a file and run the exe to play.
